website_summaries.verdict: Armed with a tasteful iridescent upper, the Puma Roma Ano is an eye-catching pair that could enhance any outfit. Not for the faint of heart, this fun pair is meant for adventurous, bold personalities who love switching up their casual looks for every day.Moreover, this shoe retains its classic silhouette and materials, offering the same comfort and fit people have come to love for years. If you are looking for an affordable shoe to spice up your dull shoe collection, the Puma Roma Ano could be worth the buy.
pros: Majority of the users of this shoe recommend it for all-day wear, as it is very comfortable
Many wearers were impressed by this shoe’s good arch support
The Puma Roma Ano is an iconic shoe with a dash of modern aesthetic through its upper’s design
Most consumers loved this kicks’ metallic upper as it is fun, unique, and has the right tint for it to be unisex
It is available in the market in various colorways
Some shoe users were happy that people were giving them compliments every time they opt for this pair
The Puma Roma Ano is claimed by many purchasers to be a great shoe available at an affordable price
cons: A few wearers disclosed that the shoe feels narrower than their standard shoe size
One online purchaser said that the pair’s color in person didn’t match the photos on the website

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Roma Ano Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: From the PUMA archives in 1968, this lightweight training shoe was equipped with comfort enhancing features such as a thick padded tongue and orthopedic arch supports. This version features an all over leather upper and fresh spring colorways.
feature_bullets: Retro-inspired fashion sneaker featuring padded tongue and collar
